text: Emmanuel Auguste Marie Joseph de la Motte Baraffe also written as De la Motte Baraffe de Lesdain (15 September 1782 â€“ 9 May 1852) was a Dutch politician. After the independence of Belgium, he had the Belgian citizenship. De la Motte Baraffe was a noble landowner from Hainaut and was a chamberlain in Brussels. For Henegouwen he served as a member of the House of Representatives for eleven years from 1815 to 1826. He died on 9 May 1852 at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1782 births Category:1852 deaths Category:Dutch politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands
title: Emmanuel Auguste Marie Joseph de la Motte Baraffe
